column3:
I'm done dealing with your incompetence.
Your final paycheck has been revoked due to theft from the register.
Don't bother using me as a reference.
Good luck affording rent and all those subscriptions now.
"What's up brother!\nTry our exclusive game and make MEGA MONEY!\nRules: Since our game offers a great opportunity
column4: we only allow players to have 3 turns per day to win BIG!\nDon't miss it!"

Your account has been overdrawn and is now TERMINATED.
All remaining assets have been seized to cover fees.
Your credit score is destroyed. You're financially dead to us.
Do not contact us again."
